prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a round shape and a cheeky expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that can roll like a ball and has a shiny red surface.
Show me a Pokemon that is known for its explosive personality and electric attacks.
Generate a Pokemon design that features a striking red and white color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a giant ball and can generate electricity.
Design a playful Pokemon that loves to hang out in urban areas and parks.
I want a Pokemon with a whimsical design that can surprise its opponents.
